summary: This is an email chain from October 2021 discussing a post-arrest statement made by Ghislaine Maxwell. The email references an FBI 302 report documenting her arrest and mentions that another individual was present in the car when the statement was made. The correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York seeking to confirm and produce the memorialized statement.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email discussion regarding her post-arrest statement, which was memorialized in an FBI 302 report related to her arrest.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest and post-arrest statement
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested, and made a statement afterward. This statement was documented in an FBI 302 report, and another individual was present in the car when the statement was made.

locations.name: Southern District of New York
locations.context: Jurisdiction of the prosecuting office mentioned in the email signature.

locations.name: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
locations.context: Address of the Assistant United States Attorney's office.

keyFacts: An FBI 302 report documents Ghislaine Maxwell's post-arrest statement.
Another individual (not named in the provided text) was present in the car when Maxwell made her post-arrest statement.
Prosecutors from the Southern District of New York were seeking to confirm and produce the memorialized statement in October 2021.
The email is external, indicating communication possibly outside the DOJ or with external parties.
